greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Final nonzero digit of n! in base 4.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: nzd[n_]:=Module[{rd=RealDigits[n!,4][[1]]},If[Last[rd]!=0,Last[rd], Last[ Flatten[Most[Split[rd]]]]]]; Array[nzd,100,0] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 08 2014 *)
results.author: _Carl R. White_, Jan 16 2008
